header.title: Smartphone for the rest of us.
header.intro: Introducing Shravan, the worldâ€™s first end-to-end accessible smartphone OS. With our patent-pending speech and vibration technology, Shravan can be easily used by the visually impaired, the unlettered, senior citizens, and everyone in between.
header.second: Shravan is Oswald Labs' research project, which takes its form both as an operating system for Android-based smartphones, and a set of inclusive, easy-to-use apps.

features.intro: Oswald Labs Platform is an extensive suite of products, open-source projects, and developer APIs and SDKs to build tools to empower the next billion users.

products.title: Breaking barriers to smartphone usage
products.intro: It works for people who have visual impairment, learning disorders, or are senior citizens. It also works for villagers, illiterate audiences, disabled users, and everyone in between.

products.title: Revolutionary technology
products.intro: It uses accessible interface patterns with different modes for correcting system-wide contrast and design settings using a patent-pending combination of vibrations, speech, and touch.

products.title: Made to empower every one of us
products.intro: It has Aadhar integration and works in native languages like Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Urdu, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Odia, Punjab, Assamese, and Maithili.

products.title: Tons of features and updates
products.intro: It has a built-in voice assistant, internet applications like live news and sports scores, music streaming, and search, and emergency features like one-tap ambulance access.
